text: Netflix will premiere “ 13 Reasons Why ” Season 2, the next chapter in its controversial hit teen - suicide drama, on May 18. The streamer announced the premiere date on social media, with the caption, “ The tapes were just the beginning. ” That came after it teased the reveal in posts earlier Monday saying “ The truth is developing ” and a live - stream showing two Polaroid photos — leaving fans on tenterhooks for several hours. Netflix announced the renewal of “ 13 Reasons ” last May, after the freshman season debuted in March 2017 and quickly captured widespread buzz.
